description: Application to clear condition 5 (solar panels) of approved application DM2024/00277 (amended with S73 DM2025/00006).
decision_conditions: Prior to the above ground level works, details of the proposed solar PV system must be submitted to the Local Planning Authority and approved in writing, including:(i) a roof plan showing the number of solar PV panels and the total area of the proposed solar PV array;(ii) detailed product specifications including the power output of each panel and revised estimates of the electricity that each panels will generate; and(iii) if necessary, revised calculations demonstrating the CO2 savings expected to be achieved.Reason: To comply with Policy 31 of the Sutton Local Plan 2018 and ensure new residential development is designed to the highest sustainability standards.
